input_text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to have fun on a computer without using the internet?
input_text.Response A: Sure, you can play lots of games on your computer. You can also use it to watch videos or listen to music.
input_text.Response B:
Personalize your computer.
Organize your computer.
Learn to Program your Computer.
Clean your computer.
Use paint or another photo editing program.
Listen to music.
Watch videos.
Write a story.
Get familiarized with your computer programs.
Make a virtual diary.
Become a computer geek.
Play Minesweeper or Solitaire.

label_annotations.feedback: A is a much better answer, being more specific and friendly.
